    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Interface representing the game board for Tetris.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (tetromino).
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating bricks in the game.
    BrickRotator
    Manages brick rotation by tracking the current rotation state and providing the next rotation shape.
    ClearRow
    Immutable data class containing information about cleared rows.
    DownData
    Immutable data class containing information returned from a down move event.
    EventSource
    Enumeration of sources that can trigger game events.
    EventType
    Enumeration of possible move event types in the game.
    GameController
    Main game controller that handles game logic and coordinates between the board and the GUI.
    GameOverPanel
    UI panel displayed when the game ends.
    GuiController
    Main GUI controller for the Tetris game.
    HighScoreManager
    Manages the high score persistence.
    HoldResult
    Immutable result class indicating the outcome of a hold operation.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling input events from the user or game thread.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris game application.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix operations used in the game.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable event class representing a move action in the game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data class containing information about the next rotated shape.
    NotificationPanel
    UI panel for displaying temporary notifications (e.g., score bonuses).
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Implementation of BrickGenerator that uses a "bag" system for brick generation.
    Score
    Represents the game score with JavaFX property binding support.
    SettingsDialog
    Dialog window for game settings configuration.
    SettingsManager
    Manages game settings persistence.
    SimpleBoard
    Implementation of the Board interface representing the game board.
    ViewData
    Immutable data class containing all information needed to render the game view.
